meanings.definition: A person who is very interested in a particular subject or activity
meanings.sent1: She is one of the history buffs in our class.
meanings.sent3: The art buff couldn't stop talking about the new exhibit.
meanings.sent4: His sister is a music buff, always seeking out new bands to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The movie buff has seen every film nominated for an award this year.

meanings.definition: A soft, thick piece of cloth used for polishing
meanings.sent1: He used a buff to shine his shoes before the party.
meanings.sent2: The car enthusiast carefully polished his vehicle with a buff.
meanings.sent3: The buff made the table sparkle like never before.
meanings.sent4: The silverware gleamed after a quick rub with the buff.
meanings.sent5: The buff brought out the shine in the marble countertop.

meanings.definition: To polish or shine something by rubbing it
meanings.sent1: She likes to buff her nails to a glossy finish.
meanings.sent2: He buffed the floor until it was spotless.
meanings.sent3: The butler buffed the silverware to perfection.
meanings.sent4: The car owner buffed out the scratches on his vehicle.
meanings.sent5: The shoes were buffed to a mirror-like shine.

meanings.definition: A light, casual jacket made of a fabric that is slightly rough to the touch
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish buff to the outdoor concert.
meanings.sent2: The buff kept him warm during the cool evening.
meanings.sent3: He sported a buff while strolling in the park.
meanings.sent4: The buff added a trendy touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The buff was the perfect choice for the breezy day.
